title: DDFP 381: Madden quarterback battles
itunes:title: DDFP 381: Madden quarterback battles
description:
Shek is joined by NFL Media's Elliot Harrison, Bucky Brooks and Handsome Hank to break down the Steelers move to pick up Michael Vick and Peyton Manning's struggles in the preseason. The guys then use the newly released Madden 16 to project the heated QB battles around the league. Lastly, Shek and Handsome play NFC West Jenga. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
